Flora Suya bụ onye Malawi na-eme ihe nkiri
A họpụtara ya dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na 6th na 9th Africa Movie Academy Awards.

Ya na Tapiwa Gwaza, Suya rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na Seasons of a Life (2010), nke na-akọ akụkọ banyere ihe isi ike nke nwa agbọghọ Africa nke onye isi ya dinara n'ụzọ mmekọahụ, onye wee jụ ya ilekọta nwa ya. O nwetara Africa Movie Academy Award maka Best Actress in a Leading Role maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri ahụ. N'afọ 2013, ọ pụtara na Shemu Joyah, Last Fishing Boat, ebe ọ bụ mmasị ịhụnanya nke onye njem nleta na nwunye nke nwoke nwere ọtụtụ nwanyị, ọrụ ahụ mere ka a họpụta ya dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na AMAA awards. N'afọ 2014, a kọrọ na ọ ga-apụta na ihe nkiri Zambia, Chenda, nke na-akọ akụkọ banyere nsogbu ụmụ nwanyị na-amaghị nwoke na-agafe na mmeghachi omume ọjọọ nke ụmụ nwoke Afrịka n'ọnọdụ ahụ. Emere ihe nkiri ahụ na sinima n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2014, wee wepụta ya n'afọ 2015. N'afọ 2016, a mara ọkwa ihe nkiri ya, My Mothers Story dịka otu n'ime ihe nkiri mmeghe na Silicon Valley African Film Festival na United States
Ihe nkiri ahụ na-akọ akụkọ banyere ahụhụ ụmụ nwanyị na-aga iji chekwaa ụlọ ha n'enweghị enyemaka di. N'ime ihe nkiri ahụ, ọ na-eme Tadala, nne na-alụbeghị di na ọnọdụ okike na ọdịbendị Afrịka.
